column2: It is your choice whether or not you provide your Subscriber Information to UpToDate, but Subscriber Information is required for UpToDate to provide you with services (for example, access to UpToDate under a subscription agreement).

You can set your browser to notify you when you receive a cookie, giving you the chance to decide whether or not to accept it.
